sentences.pinyin: tā gěi wǒ yīgè jiāxīn bǐnggān.
sentences.translation: He gave me a sandwich cookie.

sentences.simplifiedText: 这道菜是用鸡肉和蔬菜制作的夹心饼。
sentences.traditionalText: 這道菜是用雞肉和蔬菜製作的夾心餅。
sentences.pinyin: zhè dào cài shì yòng jīròu hé shūcài zhìzuò de jiāxīn bǐng.
sentences.translation: This dish is a sandwich cake made with chicken and vegetables.
